title: In game stuttering and FPS drops!
body:
Hi,

 I've been experiencing a lot of fps drops when playing the game which is making it nearly impossible to play. Most would respond with your hardware needs an update but my current computer has a i7-7700k, a gtx 980ti, 32gb RAM, 960 pro, etc... So I know that's not the issue.
 I have reinstalled the game multiple times, in hopes that the problem would be solved, I've downloaded the hextec repair tool, again no luck. I have searched on forums and boards for anyone having the same issue but I haven't come across it thus far. 
 This is the only game I'm getting dramatic fps drops, even tho it is the least GPU demanding game I play. 

 Someone, please help!

 Thanks.

replies.body: FPS drops don't necessarily require a hardware upgrade, but more often than not they're fixed up by a simple driver update. Make sure to check for any updates for your graphics drivers as well as DirectX, and hit up the rest of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) while you're at it. Feel free to hit me back if that doesn't help!
